name: KnightMare (itch) (JohnnyCappuccino)
description:
Fun mobile game that currently has 2 game modes.  One is a story type game mode which only has one level currently and the other one is a survival type where u battle waves of enemies which get progressively harder.

Thank you to Eder Muniz for the background.

his link https://edermunizz.itch.io/
